h1: Calories in Panda Express Chow Mein
assumptions: Standard side serving (approx. 266 g) as prepared by Panda Express, including noodles, cabbage, celery, and light sauce.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, portion size, and preparation; values based on official data. Check Panda Express app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One serving of Panda Express Chow Mein contains about 510 calories and 13 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with restaurant menus.

tweaks.label: Vegetarian with extra veggies (no oil reduction)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Panda Express Chow Mein serving?
faqs.a: Approximately 510 calories per standard side serving.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Panda Express Chow Mein?
faqs.a: About 70 g total carbs, including 5 g fiber and 9 g sugars per serving.

faqs.q: Is Panda Express Chow Mein high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1020 mg sodium per serving due to the sauce and seasonings.

faqs.q: How much protein in Panda Express Chow Mein?
faqs.a: Roughly 13 g protein per serving from the noodles and vegetables.

faqs.q: Can I make it lower calorie at Panda Express?
faqs.a: Request half portion or pair with steamed veggies to reduce calories.
